headline: 3 Dividend ETFs That Actually Protect Against Market Crashes
summary: The stock market has had a great start to 2026, and its upward trend has continued so far. However, it doesn’t mean that the rally will keep going. There’s a risk of AI bubble collapse, a slow labor market, and geopolitical issues that could impact the stock market. Investors should never try to time the ... 3 Dividend ETFs That Actually Protect Against Market Crashes

headline: S&P Global Expands Climate Analytics And Private Credit Benchmarks For Investors
summary: S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI) has partnered with Verisk to deliver climate catastrophe risk analytics through its ESG platforms. The company has also introduced the S&P Lincoln Senior Debt Index Series with Lincoln International to track private credit markets. S&P Global, best known for its credit ratings, benchmarks, and data platforms, is putting more attention on climate risk and private markets. The tie up with Verisk brings catastrophe risk data into ESG workflows, which is particularly...

headline: Barclays Cuts S&P Global (SPGI) Price Target but Maintains Overweight Rating
summary: S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) is included among the 13 Best Strong Buy Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 23, Barclays analyst Manav Patnaik lowered his price recommendation on S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) to $565 from $620. The analyst maintained an Overweight rating on the shares.
